title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 1 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali Alas American Amitava Ananta Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharata Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhīma Bochkareva Buddhavarapu Caitanya Cekitāna Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devadatta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Draupadī Droṇa Drupada Duryodhana Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Govinda Gupta Hanumān Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Janārdana Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Karṇa Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntibhoja Kuntī Kuru Kurukṣetra KurukṣetraTEXT Kṛpa Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Madhusūdana Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Nakula Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Pārtha Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sahadeva Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sañjaya Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Somadatta Sondhi Sreenivasa Subhadrā Sucandra Sudarshan Sughoṣa Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Sātyaki Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Uttamaujā Varna Vasudeva Veeranna Vijayanti Vikarṇa Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra Yudhāmanyu Yuyudhāna Śaibya

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 2 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharata Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bochkareva Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dhanañjaya Dharma Divyambra Douglas Droṇa Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Govinda Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntī Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Madhu Madhusūdana Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Pārtha Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sañjaya Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Vedas Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra kṣatriya kṣatriyas yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 3 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhāratas Bochkareva Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janaka Janvi Janārdana Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Keśava Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntī Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Pārtha Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Vedas Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra karma yajña yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 4 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharata Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhārata Bochkareva Brahman Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuru Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manu Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Vedas Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vivasvān Vyas Yatra Yogendra yoga yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 5 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bochkareva Brahman Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntī Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra karma yoga yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 6 Sanskrit Terms

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 7 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharata Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhāratas Bochkareva Brahman Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntī Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 8 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhāratas Bochkareva Brahman Brahmā Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntī Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Madhusūdana Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Pārtha Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Vedas Vedāntists Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra adhibhūta adhiyajña adhyātma karma kāra yoga yogī yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 9 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bochkareva Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dhanañjaya Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indra Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntī Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Sāma Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Vedas Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra vaiśyas

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 10 Sanskrit Terms
text: Agni Ahuja Airāvata Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Ananta Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Aryamā Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Asita Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhṛgu Bochkareva Brahmā Buddhavarapu Bṛhaspati Bṛhat Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Citraratha Daitya Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devala Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Gandharvas Ganga Garuḍa Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Himālayas Hona Indra Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Janārdana Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kandarpa Kangovi Kaniveedu Kapila Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuvera Kārttikeya Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Marīci Meru Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Nāgas Nārada Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Prahlāda Pran Priya Purata Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Rudras Rāma Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Sāma Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Varuṇa Vasudeva Veda Vedas Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Vyāsa Vāsudeva Vāsuki Yakṣas Yama Yatra Yogendra sāma Ādityas Śiva

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 11 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Asuras Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhāratas Bochkareva Brahmā Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Droṇa Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Gandharvas Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Janārdana Jayadratha Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Karṇa Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuru Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Rudras Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sañjaya Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Sādhyas Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Vedas Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Viśvedevas Vyas Yakṣas Yatra Yogendra Yādava kumāras Ādityas Śiva

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 12 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bochkareva Brahman Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Yatra Yogendra bhakti yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 15 Sanskrit Terms

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 18 Sanskrit Terms
text: Ahuja Aishwarya Akiralali American Amitava Anantha Andrei Anika Anita Anna Appanaboyina Arjuna Asangi Ashmi Ashram Ashwini Balaji Balarāma Bhagavad Bhagwan Bhakta Bhakti Bhaktipriya Bhaktivedanta Bhanumati Bharata Bharati Bhattji Bhavanarushi Bhoomi Bhāratas Bochkareva Brahman Buddhavarapu Caitanya Chandan Chandra Chetana Dasa Dasanudas Dasi Datta Devaki Devarajula Devi Dharma Divyambra Douglas Dāsa Evgeniya Gagan Ganga Geeta Geetanjali Gilhotra Gita Gopavrindapala Gopika Gopikesa Gopishwari Gosai Gostavihari Gotra Gupta Hari Hayagriva Hona Indradyumna Isvari Janvi Jayanti Jivana Jordan Kadam Kaku Kalyanapu Kangovi Kaniveedu Karuna Katechia Kishana Klonitskaia Koppula Krasimira Kresna Kripalu Krishna Krsna Kuntī Lakshmipati Lokadhyaksa Madhai Mahamaya Mahavisnupriya Mala Maninbhushuita Mantra Manubhai Mishra Mohan Murugan Narayan Negi Nidhi Niranjan Nisha Nitai Nityananda Pandya Pari Patlolla Patnala Prabhupāda Pran Priya Purata Pārtha Radhapati Ragatmika Raghavendra Rajasa Rajasagi Rajendra Rajendran Rajeswari Rama Raman Ramani Ramchandani Ramesta Ranjana Ravi Rishi Riya Rohan Sachi Sameeksha Sandi Santhi Sarni Sañjaya Sharan Sharma Shichova Shilpa Shravan Shri Shrita Shyam Sinha Sipra Siromani Sondhi Sreenivasa Sucandra Sudarshan Sundaram Susheela Svetlana Swami Swarnendu Swetha Talati Taneja Tati Tatiana Varna Vasudeva Vedānta Veeranna Vijayanti Vishnu Vishwatma Vyas Vyāsa Yatra Yogendra kṣatriyas sannyāsa tyāga vaiśyas yoga
